paper_abstract: Perfect teleportation and superdense coding are discussed via a special kind of W-state. It is shown that the state can be used for perfect teleportation of the state x vertical bar 0 >(circle times N) + y vertical bar 1 >(circle times N). And the state can be utilized for superdense coding. Moreover, it is demonstrated that the sender can transmit N classical bits to the receiver by sending N - 1 qubits.
paper_title: PERFECT TELEPORTATION, SUPERDENSE CODING VIA A KIND OF W-CLASS STATE
